title: Feminist AF: A Guide to Crushing Girlhood
description: Norton Young Readers has acquired Feminist AF: A Guide to Crushing Girlhood by Brittney Cooper, Chanel Craft Tanner, and Susana Morris, founding members of the Crunk Feminist Collective. The book is a guide for teen girls who want to be unapologetically feminist and live their feminism out loud. The book will be published in summer 2020, marking Crunk's 10th anniversary.
author: Brittney Cooper
